name: WP Tools Divi Product Carousel
author: WP Tools

sections.description:
Plugin depreciated. No further development planned for this plugin. Only maintenance and compatibility updates will be issued

Use our Ultimate Carousel For Divi plugin. It has better functionality.

The WP Tools Divi Product Carousel plugin provides a divi module for cycling through WooCommerce Products

Show your featured products on a carousel using the Divi Product Carousel module.

This plugin requires Divi Theme (Affiliate link) be installed and activated.

Product Carousel module provides following functionality.

  • Full visual builder support
  • Unlimited products
  • Sort by drag and drop
  • Set items per slide for desktop view.

Premium Version Features

Premium plugin – 7 Day FREE trial

To learn about premium features, setup & styling visit https://wptools.app/how-to/setup-and-style-divi-product-carousel/

1.4.0

  • Added compatibility for Divi 4.5.1+
  • Compatible with WordPress 5.4.2

1.3.0

[//]: # fs_premium_only_begin
* Added ability enable/disable link to product details page. Default is enabled
* Added ability to show/hide product short description on the carousel slide. Default is hidden.
* Added ability to add styles to product short description.
[//]: # fs_premium_only_end

1.2.0

  • Vertical centering of products by default.
    [//]: # fs_premium_only_begin
  • Divi module option to make slides of equal height
  • Divi module option to set the number of products to slide per carousel motion.
    [//]: # fs_premium_only_end

1.1.0

  • Updated freemius SDK to 2.3.2
  • Moved settings from WP Tools to Divi. Removed parent WP Tools settings page.
  • Fixed advanced/toggle options in divi module for wp.org version.
  • Tested for WordPress 5.4
    [//]: # fs_premium_only_begin
  • Removed Premium label from premium divi module
    [//]: # fs_premium_only_end

1.0.0

  • Created free version for wordpress.org
  • Created premium version for freemius.com
  • Added 7 day free trial
sections.installation:
1. Goto your WordPress Admin > Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for wp-tools-divi-product-carousel.
  3. Install and activate plugin (with the author as wpt00ls)
sections.faq:
Can you tell me more about the premium features?

Details on our premium features are available at https://wptools.app/how-to/setup-and-style-divi-product-carousel/

Are there are any dependencies for this plugin

No, there are no dependencies for this plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.7.0

  • Fixed incompatibility with WordPress 6.5 which caused a critical error.

1.6.0

  • PHP 8.1 compatible
  • Freemius upgrade

=1.5.1=
* Freemius upgrade

=1.5.0=
* Updated freemius SDK to v2.4.3
* WP version 5.9.2

short_description: A divi product carousel module to create a slide-show with WooCommerce product items.

screenshots.caption: This screenshot shows an carousel created using the Divi Product Carousel
Divi module settings. Add multiple products. Reorder then with drag and drop. Setup the initial slide to start on and number of products per slide (only on desktop view.)
